data.description:
When you create this symbol, choose a damage type: air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light, or poison. The creature bearing this symbol suffers 5 extra damage from sources dealing damage of the chosen type.

You Spend: @LOSS[2 ip]
Target Receives: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.fibQb1UfU30emdPw], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.OZQP3SwLMPreHOoH], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.dRxsZ0W1HOvl9UhW], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.miRcuE6VNnxP0lgg], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.NkE6UCLYl7ib9ft6], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ZoTGGhZH7ShEMImB], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.p90qw9XnvGFHDwUU], or @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.m0bGyMRsayBmSyTt]
